name: West of East
description:
We, a group of Future Games students, present to you, West of East! A Tarantino-inspired RTS game with a cyber western twist.

Follow Curtis Berekely on his journey for revenge on The Stallion Bandits, a gang dressed like and living the life of the old wild west. With him is an old friend, ex-mercenary, Irene Holt. Together they plan to infiltrate and take out the bandits. As they arrive in the town of Oatman, they find that all the bandits have left and only the security AI roam the town. Now they need to find the admin bot to figure out where the bandits are heading. 

 Oatman is a stunning town, with neon signs and old western buildings, but it’s as dangerous as it is beautiful. Play as both Curtis and Irene, combine their abilities to efficiently move through the town. Hide in haystacks, dash through robots or smoke your way out of a sticky situation. By the time you’re done with these bots, the sand will be blackened and drenched in oil.
